title: Understanding ourselves: human heredity
brief_description: Illustrates the basic concepts of heredity in an easily understandable context. The mechanism whereby human characteristics are passed from generation to generation is discussed. The function of chromosomes, genes, and DNA in the heredity pattern is explained. Also considers the influence of temperament, behaviour and mutation.
